sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Cisco Systems ( CSCO ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 4.4%.
Year to date, Cisco Systems registers a 4.7% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Chevron Corporation ( CVX ), trading down 1.2%.
Chevron Corporation is lower by about 23.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Pfizer ( PFE ), trading down 1.0%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 1.0% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
